name: bcatch
actor_no_arg: You reach out and rescue the bottle from its flight.
others_no_arg: $n reaches out and grabs the bottle of beer tossed to $m.
actor_found_target: You reach out and rescue the bottle from its flight.
others_found: $n reaches out and catches a bottle of beer in flight.
target_found: $n reaches out and grabs the bottle of beer tossed $s way.
others_auto: $n looks all around, frantically searching for some beer!
